title: Laravel-GoBaby-app
description: This project i created using Laravel. I created an ecom website where users could buy and sell their baby products. I created roles where one admins could edit delete products etc. Where users could only delete or edit their own. I used mySQL to store this data where i used migations to prefill my data. Both sets of users could filter through items to match their preferences.

title: StockX-remake
description: This was my first ever project i created. I had recreate a website of my choice and hard code everything. This project was very challenging for me with no experince of coding and it was time consuming as everything was hardcoded. You can go to the next page by clicking about in nav and back to index by clicking the logo on top left

title: OOP
description: This application i created using OOP. I would have different classes and within the console of each class you could type specific commands such as dog and console would respond with a bark Or set up a basket where you add items to basket then can see the overall price

title: PHP-Magazine
description: This project was first created hardcoded, which is the website link. However then i created a database where users could add articles and click and view a specific one. This was the first project i did which had front-end and backend

title: Clash
description: My colleague and I created a competitive gaming application for out third year project. The application was built using laravel and react. The aim of the application is to allow users to create and join teams and matchmake against other users with a similar rank. The inspiration to create this project came from existing applications such as GameBattles and FaceIt
I created an application using expo and react-native which is used for finding new recipes which are created by other users
title: FlavourFind

description: I used two different bert pretrained model to do sentiment analysis on movie reviews. This allowed me to see how the model picks up on certain words, where i could see the accuracy of each model.
title: IMDB Reviews Text Classification
